name: autumnally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or is typical of autumn: Office workers were autumnally dressed in jackets and scarves on the first chilly day of September. The front porch of the inn was decorated autumnally, with pumpkins, gourds, and other elements of the harvest.
More examplesFewer examplesThey like to drive north to Vermont every October to peek at the autumnally coloured foliage. At the October beer festival, you can sample a range of beers and ciders in autumnally appropriate flavours.
